detailedRequirements:
Welcome to $200 Sundowment Circle Hover Effects (Wordpress)
For this F2F, we need your help update existing Wordpress Theme to show Circle hover effects based on provided storyboard design

Read more details information below.
finalSubmissionGuidelines:
IMPORTANT
This F2F is subjective - so the first solution that the client likes and fulfills the required updates will win. We will consider all submissions until a the winner is declared.

Attachment Files
storyboard.zip - Storyboard for Circle Hover Effects  
submission-structure.zip -  Wordpress theme as base updates

Web Browsers Requirements
- Safari latest version
- Firefox latest version
- Chrome latest version
- Safari Browsers on iPad Standard/Retina (Landscape and Portrait Orientation)
- Safari Browsers on iPhone Standard/Retina (Landscape and Portrait Orientation)

Important!
- Your UI Prototype submission need remain support responsive layout.  
- DO NOT break existing responsive layout
- Let us know if you face any problem related responsive layout on required platforms
- Follow existing code and layout implementation

F2F Requirements:
- For this F2F, you just need update circle into using flip effect.
- Ignore content differences like storyboard look
- Remove existing tooltips function
- We need change into Flip hover effect.
- See this site for expected styling: http://tympanus.net/Tutorials/CircleHoverEffects/index4.html
- For desktop need triggered the effect on hover, for mobile need triggered by click
- On page load, white background with icons need show up
- After flip effect, need show gradient background and related text
- Each text need editable
- You might need create custom fields for default and hover of icon and text content
- You might need update existing HTML template, CSS or JS files
- Match font size for each circle
- Apply flip effects for these 2 pages:

1. For Homeowners page
screenshot: 01-(hover-single) Home-Owner.png
screenshot: 02-(hover) Home-Owner.png

2. For Endownments page
screenshot: 03-(hover-single) Endowments.png
screenshot: 04-(hover) Endowments.png

F2F GUIDELINES
We will review submissions as they are submitted
We will review ALL submissions until we declare a winner based on
1) Task Requirements
2) Client is happy with how it looks/works
3) Time the solution was submitted

Let us know if you have any questions.

Thank you
